subject: College Athletics
Football
Presidential Election of 2008
lead_paragraph: President-elect Barack Obama has come out in favor of an eight-team playoff system for college football, thereby proving (a) that he is capable of multitasking and (b) that he can be wrong.
snippet: President-elect Barack Obama has come out in favor of an eight-team playoff system for college football, thereby proving (a) that he is capable of multitasking and (b) that he can be wrong.
